price: Sekiranya, ada di langit dan di bumi tuhan-tuhan selain Allah, tentulah keduanya itu telah rusak binasa.  Maka Maha Suci Allah yang mempunyai arasy daripada apa yang mereka sifatkan.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: law kāna fīhimā ālihatun illā al-lahu lafasadatā fasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
